attributes.action: Rejoin the European Union as soon as possible
attributes.background: Yesterday the people of the UK voted to leave the European Union, however there were huge areas where a leave vote got very little traction, and a lot of electoral promises that swayed a lot of voters were immediately dismissed as not happening, in light of this rejoining the EU seems a sound option

rejection.details: The UK has not yet left the EU. You could start a new petition calling for the Government to give an undertaking that it will reapply for EU membership as soon as the UK leaves the EU.
